DOC.brief_summary: Heparinized solution has been used for maintenance of arterial catheter during perioperative period. Although the infused dose of heparin is very low, the investigators examine whether the heparin effect is remained or not in blood using rotational thromboelastometry (ROTEM) analysis.
DOC.criteria: Patients requiring continuous invasive arterial pressure monitoring during operation for anesthetic management. heparin hypersensitivity hematologic disease anticoagulant medication
